text.div:
This code system http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/attribution-code-system defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
adv-imputed-pcp Advantage Imputed PCPPrimary care physician imputed by the Advantage pipeline
client-emr-pcp Client EMR PCPPrimary care physician recorded in a client's PMS or EMR system
eng-attr-pcp Engagement Attributed PCPPrimary care physician attributed by the patient engagement pipeline
eng-attr-specialist Engagement Attributed SpecialistSpecialist physician attributed by the patient engagement pipeline
enrollment EnrollmentPractitioner provided on the eligibility record

name: AttributionCodeSystem
title: Attribution Codes
description: Types of attribution used to associate a patient to a provider

concept.definition: Primary care physician imputed by the Advantage pipeline
Primary care physician recorded in a client's PMS or EMR system
Primary care physician attributed by the patient engagement pipeline
Specialist physician attributed by the patient engagement pipeline
Practitioner provided on the eligibility record
